name: stake-engine-math-sdk
description: Complete Stake Engine Math SDK with Frontend Integration

math-engine.description: Math engine for game calculations and simulations

frontend.description: Frontend SDK integration with Stake web SDK

scripts.setup: make setup && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: make setup && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: make test && cd frontend && npm test
scripts.dev: make setup && cd frontend && npm run dev
